Class ImportFilterManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.jailer.importfilter.ImportFilterManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    public abstract class ImportFilterManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements ImportFilterTransformer
    Manages filtering of data during import.

    Ralf Wisser
